title: Ticket #3190: Adding ClassAd::Rename/Move method
description:
I noticed that the ClassAd class does not have a Rename or Move method.
(Either name would make sense to me)

I.e. something with the semantics of 

{
  ExprTree *olde=jobClassAd->Remove(oldname);
  jobClassAd->Insert(newname,olde);
}

Apart from being easier to use, e.g.: 

jobClassAd->Rename(oldname,newname);
it would likely be more efficient, too.
Plus, it would be easier to make it atomic.

Example code that would use this is during Status changes of a Job ClassAd, where we want to preserve the previous information. 

jobClassAd->Rename("JobStatus","LastJobStatus");
remarks:
2012-Aug-14 06:01:00 by matt:
This would not be usable for ATTR_JOB_STATUS and ATTR_LAST_JOB_STATUS because they must go through the transaction log, which is layered above the ClassAd interface.
